author: Rebecca Downs
title: More Big Tech Censorship: RNC Video of Interview with Donald Trump Removed from YouTube

sentence: In the state of Georgia, thanks to Brian Kemp, our elections were absolutely stolen.
author: Kimberley A. Strassel
title: The Limits of Stop the Steal

sentence: The former president had been waging a personal vendetta against Georgia's governor Brian Kemp and secretary of state Brad Raffensperger for failing to overturn the 2020 presidential election in his favor.
author: David Smith
title: Trump-backed nominees lost in Georgia, but can Republicans escape the specter of Maga?
